Doomsday Portent.name: Doomsday Portent
Doomsday Portent.flavor: You prophesize the demise of your enemy, filling it with horrifying visions of its death.
Doomsday Portent.onHit: The target is dazed and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Prepared by Fate.name: Prepared by Fate
Prepared by Fate.flavor: Using your powers of foresight, you anticipate a conflict and are ready for it.
Prepared by Fate.effect: You gain a +20 bonus to the initiative check.

Vestige of the Sea Tyrant.name: Vestige of the Sea Tyrant
Vestige of the Sea Tyrant.flavor: Your magic evokes the wrath of the Sea Tyrant, sweeping your foes away.
Vestige of the Sea Tyrant.onHit: 3d6 + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier and knock it prone.
Vestige of the Sea Tyrant.effect: You gain access to the vestige of the Sea Tyrant.
Vestige of the Sea Tyrant.seaTyrantPactBoon: You slide one creature cursed by you that you can see a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Vestige of the Sea Tyrant.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: You also slide your eyes of the vestige target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
